Package ohos.accessibility.ability

Class DisplayResizeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.accessibility.ability.DisplayResizeController

  • public class DisplayResizeController
extends Object
    Provides a controller for the display resizing operations.

    This controller offers the following functions:

    1. Registering a listener to observe the display resizing operations.
    2. Controlling the display resizing.
    Since:
    3
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Accessibility#ABILITY

        Parameters:
        connectionId - Indicates the connection ID used to create DisplayResizeController.
        displayId - Indicates the display ID used to create DisplayResizeController.
        lock - Indicates the lock used to create DisplayResizeController.

        Returns:

      • setScale

        public boolean setScale​(float scale,
                        boolean isShouldAnimate)
        Sets the display resizing scale.
        Parameters:
        scale - Indicates the scale for resizing the display, ranging from 1.0f to 10.0f.
        isShouldAnimate - Specifies whether animation is required. The value can be true or false.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the resizing scale is successfully set; returns false otherwise.

      • setCenter

        public boolean setCenter​(float centerX,
                         float centerY,
                         boolean isShouldAnimate)
        Sets the center coordinates for the display resizing rectangle.
        Parameters:
        centerX - Indicates the X coordinate of the center for resizing the display.
        centerY - Indicates the Y coordinate of the center for resizing the display.
        isShouldAnimate - Specifies whether animation is required. The value can be true or false.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the center coordinates are successfully set; returns false otherwise.

      • getDisplayResizeRect

        public Rect getDisplayResizeRect​()
        Obtains the display resizing rectangle.
        Returns:
        Returns the display resizing rectangle.

      • reset

        public boolean reset​(boolean isShouldAnimate)
        Resets the display to its initial size.
        Parameters:
        isShouldAnimate - Specifies whether animation is required. The value can be true or false.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the display is successfully reset; returns false otherwise.
